entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 22 April 2023
